# reactiveTextureUsage

**Instance Property**

The minimal texture usage options that your app’s reactive texture needs in order to support this scaler.

## Declaration

```swift
var reactiveTextureUsage: MTLTextureUsage { get }
```
title: reactiveTextureUsage
